get order flowers now for jacob 's visitation service. jun 22. 11:00 am maraman billings funeral home605 preston hwy. shepherdsville, ky, us, 40165. get order flowers now for jacob 's service cemetery details. walls family cemetery. walls hollow road. shepherdsville, ky, usget show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of jacob meyers sr. send comfort to the meyers family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! sh sheri harper. jun 19 at 10:34 pm i'm so sorry for your loss ... delores (meyers-stewart) was talking about jacob and henry when they came to middletown all the time and how they would bring carolyn with them sometimes ... she was also remembering them as kids, talking about going to their grandparents house there in knoxville and the farm house ... and a lot of other memories that she has ... jacob is going to be missed dearly ... praying for your family tonight ... god bless. comment share comment share facebook twitter
